* Amendment Number: 3

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Jason St-Onge
* Contact Email: [jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca)

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a Perimeter Intrusion Detection System (PIDS) and Factory Acceptance Test (FAAS) computer system for the Grande Cache Institution. The system must be capable of detecting intrusions and providing alerts to authorized personnel.

## Statement of Work

* Supply, pre-configure, factory test, deliver, and install two (2x) new PIDS/FAAS S100 industrial computers, part number: PTI-S100-SVR-P4
* Provide associated installation hardware (touchscreen monitors, fibre modules, network switches)
* Install and test all required alarm points to ensure the new system is functioning as per CSC specifications and standards
* Deliverables must be received on or before September 6th, 2024

## Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest priced compliant bid

## Procurement Process

* All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* Documentary evidence of certification, licensing, and experience may be required
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

## Note to Bidders

* Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from the Canada buys/tender opportunities
